meanings.definition: Resembling or characteristic of a boob.
meanings.sent1: Her outfit had a boobish color that made her stand out.
meanings.sent2: The toy had a cute, boobish face that kids loved.
meanings.sent3: He jokingly called his friend's mistake a boobish move.
meanings.sent4: The cloud in the sky had a boobish shape, resembling a cartoon character.
meanings.sent5: The puppy's behavior was so boobish, wagging its tail happily.

meanings.definition: Behaving in a foolish or silly manner.
meanings.sent1: The comedian's boobish jokes made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent2: She regretted her boobish decision to wear mismatched socks.
meanings.sent3: Trying to juggle too many tasks at once, he ended up in a boobish situation.
meanings.sent4: The cat's boobish antics entertained the whole family.
meanings.sent5: His attempt at a magic trick was so boobish that it made everyone chuckle.
